author: @TarasBuria
title: Forza Horizon 5 'Horizon Realms' update adds new content to the game alongside PS5 launch
text:
In January 2025, when Playground Games announced the end of new playlists in Forza Horizon 5, the studio promised more content for the game. Now, with the launch on PlayStation 5 looming over the horizon (get it?), Playground Games published details about what is coming to the game in April.
The studio calls "Horizon Realms" one of the biggest updates for the game to date. New accolades, new vehicles, a new Stadium Track, Skill Mode, a fresh car pack, and more:
This April, the Horizon Festival evolves with Horizon Realms. This brand-new feature will let players dig into Forza Horizon 5’s history of Evolving World updates. Explore 12 fantastic Evolving World locations: 11 of the best previously limited-time locations and the premiering Stadium Track.
Collect new Horizon Realms-exclusive accolades to unlock four new-to-Horizon reward cars. Revisit your favorite environments, or discover them for the first time!
Horizon Realms will bring back some of the user-favorite locations from the previous updates. Look out for the following 11 spots on the map:
- Stunt Park
- Ice Rink
- Oval Track
- Summer Party
- Neon Airstrip
- Día de Muertos
- Winter Wonderland
- Lunar Drift Arena
- Retrowave Highway
- Cars and Coffee
- Stadium Maze
Each location will have five additional accolades to unlock (various tasks to complete in-game), which you will be able to track on the new Accolade tab. Also, the game will let you earn some of the accolades you might have previously missed.
Another addition is the brand-new Stadium Track and the Horizon Stadium Circuit.
As for the new cars, everyone will get a chance to earn the following new-to-the-game vehicles:
- 2024 Lamborghini Revuelto
- 2023 Lamborghini Huracan Sterrato
- 2018 Lotus Exige Cup 430
- 2022 Hennessey Mammoth 6x6
Also, a new car pack will be available for purchase on April 25. It will offer gamers four retro Nissan vehicles: the 1989 Nissan Pao, 1991 Nissan Figaro, 1989 Nissan Scargo, and 1987 Nissan Be-1. The pack will cost $4.99 and be available for purchase on April 25.
Finally, Forza Horizon 5 now has a release date on PlayStation 5. You can preorder the game, which will be available on April 29. It will offer a 60 FPS Performance mode and a 30 FPS Quality mode. Owners of the PlayStation 5 Pro will benefit from better visual fidelity and ray-traced car reflections in Quality mode.
Those preordering Premium Edition will get to play the game four days earlier, on April 25. Every preorder, regardless of the edition, gets you the 2021 Mercedes-AMG ONE, 5,000 Forzathon Points, and 5 Backstage Passes for purchasing hard-to-find cars.
You can read more about Horizon Realms in a post on the official Forza website.

author: @Masrawy
title: امتحانات الثانوية العامة في المنيا.. 7 حالات إغماء بسبب الفيزياء | مصراوى
text:
المنيا- جمال محمد:
أعلن مصدر بمديرية التربية والتعليم بمحافظة المنيا، إصابة 7 حالات بين الطلبة والطالبات بإغماء وإعياء شديد داخل عدد من اللجان الإدارات التعليمية المختلفة، أثناء أدائهم لامتحان مادة الفيزياء.
وأشار المصدر إلى نقل بعض المصابين بسيارات الإسعاف إلى المستشفيات القريبة لتلقي العلاج، فيما تبقى الآخرين العلاج بالمدرسة، مع تحرير محاضر إدارية باللجان.
كما أكد المصدر أن غرفة العمليات بالمديرية تلقت بلاغاً أفاد بضبط طالب أثناء الغش بالهاتف المحمول، وتحرر محضر للطالب واتخاذ كافة الإجراءات القانونية.
ويؤدي امتحانات الثانوية العامة هذا العام على مستوى محافظة المنيا ، 34,832 طالبًا وطالبة، إلى جانب 35 طالبًا من مدرسة المتفوقين للعلوم والتكنولوجيا (STEM)، و20 طالبًا من مدارس النور للمكفوفين، من خلال تجهيز 92 لجنة امتحانية بكافة الإدارات التعليمية، بالإضافة إلى لجنة بمركز الإصلاح والتأهيل، كما تم تجهيز استراحات المراقبين والملاحظين ( 32 استراحة) وتزويدها بجميع المستلزمات التي تضمن راحتهم طوال فترة الامتحانات.

author: Europa Press Extremadura
title: Sindicatos se concentran frente a la Asamblea para pedir la homologación salarial de los docentes extremeños
text:
MÉRIDA, 27 Mar. (EUROPA PRESS) -
 Delegados sindicales de CSIF, ANPE, CCOO, UGT y PIDE se han concentrado este jueves frente a la Asamblea de Extremadura, con motivo de la celebración del pleno de la Cámara, con el objetivo reclamar a la Consejería de Educación la homologación salarial de los docentes extremeños con respecto al resto de España.
 Los sindicatos se han concentrado tras una pancarta en la que se podía leer 'Homologación salarial de los docentes de Extremadura', y los participantes han estado haciendo sonar silbatos y cencerros en protesta por la "ruptura unilateral" de la negociación del salario de los docentes que trabajan en Extremadura.
 Así lo ha destacado, en declaraciones a los medios, el portavoz de la Intersindical y secretario de la Federación de Educación de CCOO Extremadura, Tomás Rodríguez, quien ha explicado que los docentes extremeños tienen "una diferencia por encima de los 300 euros de media" con los del resto del Estado, "haciendo exactamente el mismo trabajo, desempeñando exactamente las mismas funciones en los centros educativos".
 Por este motivo, se han concentrado frente a la Asamblea para "transmitirle este mensaje a todos los grupos políticos", tras lo que a defendido que sus reivindicaciones "son justas, oportunas y razonables", ante las que los sindicatos están "abiertos al diálogo".
 En ese sentido, siguen "pendientes de que la Consejería se quiera volver a sentar con voluntad de negociar este asunto sin cerrarse en los 30 euros que nos puso sobre la mesa en la primera fase de esta negociación", una propuesta que Rodríguez ha calificado de "completamente insuficientes" y a partir de ahí "cerró la negociación".
 "A partir de ahí nosotros ya no hemos tenido margen para proponer nada más", ha señalado el portavoz de los sindicatos, quien ha explicado que en esa reunión realizaron "una contraoferta" sobre la que están esperando respuesta, por lo que "la pelota en su tejado en este momento", ha dicho Tomás Rodríguez.
 Por este motivo, el portavoz de los sindicatos ha pedido a la Consejería de Educación que se siente a "negociar unas cantidades que sean realmente justas, razonables y proporcionadas a lo que estamos pidiendo", ha dicho.
 En el marco de esta reivindicación, los sindicatos están convocando concentraciones todos los miércoles en distintos centros educativos de la región, en las que se ha ido incrementando la participación, ha señalado Rodríguez.
RECOGIDAS DE FIRMAS Además, han recogido hasta el momentos en torno a 8.000 firmas que presentarán este viernes, 28 de febrero, en el registro de la Consejería de Educación, todo ello con el objetivo de "trasladar el malestar de la comunidad educativa, de los docentes específicamente, por la falta de voluntad negociadora de esta Administración", ha dicho.
 Los sindicatos consideran que es necesario "volver a sentar y que tenemos que volver a hablar y desbloquear este asunto", ha señalado Tomás Rodríguez, quien ha apuntado que no van "a cejar en nuestro empeño" y van a "seguir con las concentraciones y con las movilizaciones hasta que la Consejería de Educación, tenga ese ánimo de negociar".
 Finalmente, Rodríguez ha recordado que en el programa electoral con el que el PP concurrió a las últimas elecciones autonómicas, "venía contemplada esta equiparación con el resto de los docentes del Estado", por lo que los sindicatos reclaman a la Junta que cumpla con su promesa electoral.

author: ANI
title: J-K witnessed 80 per cent decline in terror-recruitment in 2023: DGP | Headlines
text: J-K witnessed 80 per cent decline in terror-recruitment in 2023: DGP Addressing a press conference at police headquarters in Jammu, DGP Swain said, "The terror ranks witnessed an 80 percent decline in recruiting local youth in 2023 due to the collaborative efforts of Police and other security agencies. The UT witnessed an 80 per cent decline in terror recruitment in 2023." [ANI](/ani-stories)| Updated: 30-12-2023 20:50 IST | Created: 30-12-2023 20:50 IST - Country: - India Jammu and Kashmir has seen an 80 per cent decline in terror recruitment in 2023, said Director General of Police J-K RR Swain on Saturday, expressing satisfaction over the collaborative efforts of the police and other security agencies to put an end to the cycle of violence in the region. Addressing a press conference at police headquarters in Jammu, DGP Swain said, "The terror ranks witnessed an 80 percent decline in recruiting local youth in 2023 due to the collaborative efforts of Police and other security agencies. The UT witnessed an 80 per cent decline in terror recruitment in 2023." "As we don't wish to disclose the figure on this occasion, for your information, only 22 recruitments took place in 2023," DGP Swain added. The DGP further said that a total of 89 terrorist modules were busted and 18 terrorist hideouts were unearthed in Jammu and Kashmir, while 99 properties worth more than Rs 170 crore, including buildings, land, orchards and commercial establishments, were attached and 68 bank accounts frozen. "More than 8,000 fake social media accounts glorifying separatism and terrorism were identified and action was taken against them," he added. He further said that the J-K Police will try at every level to curb recruitment in the terror ranks; besides, efforts are on to put an end to the cycle of violence. The DGP also said that a total of 76 terrorists, including 55 foreigners, were killed, 291 terrorist associates arrested and 201 overground workers booked under the Public Safety Act in Jammu and Kashmir this year. He added that only 31 local terrorists--an all-time low--are left in the Union Territory. "14 civilians were also killed by terrorists in 2023, and there was a decline of 63 per cent in terror-related incidents as compared to the last year, while recruitment of terrorists has also gone down with strike calls and stone-pelting on continuous decline," DGP Swain added. (ANI) (This story has not been edited by Devdiscourse staff and is auto-generated from a syndicated feed.)

author: sina.com.cn
title: Switch 2六月发售！首发游戏汇总：《赛博朋克2077》《双影奇境》也来了|Switch|双影奇境|赛博朋克2077_新浪科技_新浪网
text:
快科技4月3日消息，任天堂Switch 2已经正式发布，将于6月5日在日本和北美发售，定价449美元。
官方同时还公布了首发护航游戏，不过绝大多数都是第三方。
得益于Switch 2的性能大增，主机模式还支持了4K分辨率，这次也能玩一些主流大作了， 其中就包括《赛博朋克2077：终极版》。
此外，双人新作《双影奇境》也将首发登场。
首发游戏名单如下：
《马力欧卡丁车世界》
《Nintendo Switch 2 秘密展》
《街霸6》
《塞尔达传说 旷野之息 NS2版》
《塞尔达传说王国之泪 NS2版》
《双影奇境》
《霍格沃兹之遗》
《HITMAN暗杀世界》
《勇气默示录 高清复刻》
《人中之龙0 导演剪辑版》
《Deltarune Chapters 1-4》
《文明7》
《孤岛冒险者》
《赛博朋克 2077》
《祇：女神之路》
《噗哟噗哟 俄罗斯方块 2S》
《符文工房龙之天地》
《信長之野望･新生 威力加强版》
《堡垒之夜》
【本文结束】如需转载请务必注明出处：快科技

author: @wbkotv
title: WKU receives $2 million from the Robert and Mary Tincher Charitable Foundation Inc.
text:
WKU receives $2 million from the Robert and Mary Tincher Charitable Foundation Inc.
BOWLING GREEN, Ky. (WBKO) - During a Board of Regents meeting, the Robert and Mary Tincher Charitable Foundation Inc. presented Western Kentucky University with a $2 million gift.
Established by Robert and Mary Tincher, the Robert and Mary Tincher Charitable Foundation Inc. is a private foundation located in Bowling Green. According to the press release, the foundation has been a supporter of WKU for decades. T
The institution has also contributed to scholarships, the Hilltopper Athletic Foundation, and the Chandler Memorial Chapel.
The donation established two new endowed scholarships: the Robert and Mary Tincher Housing Scholarship and the Robert and Mary Tincher Lady Topper Housing Scholarship.
In honor of the gift, the Board of Regents voted to approve the renaming of a residence hall, which will be announced at a future date.
“Bob and Mary Tincher were two of the most generous people that I have ever known,” said Joe Bill Campbell, general counsel of the Tincher Charitable Foundation in a press release. “They loved this community. They didn’t have any children, and they considered this community to be their family.”
According to Amanda Trabue, Vice President for Philanthropy & Alumni Engagement, the gift honors the legacy of Robert and Mary Tincher and their deep passion for WKU.
“What amazing news from two amazing people who just loved this university,” said President Timothy C. Caboni in a press release.
The WKU Board of Regents will next meet on Friday, January 24, 2025, to conduct committee meetings.

author: Valley City Times-Record
title: L.A. Comic Katie Love’s Award-Winning Memoir “Two Tickets to Paradise: From Cult to Comedy” – A 2024 Must-Read | User | times-online.com
text: In her recently published memoir, “Two Tickets to Paradise: From Cult to Comedy,” L.A. comic Katie Love presents a deeply personal exploration into themes of resilience, self-discovery, and fortitude. Delving into the depths of childhood innocence, the harrowing lure of cultish ideologies, and the redemptive power of humor, Love’s memoir stands as a captivating must-read for 2024. Winner of the National Indie Excellence Award, Two Tickets to Paradise: From Cult to Comedy unfolds during the tumultuous 1970s within a landscape colored by cultural upheaval and shifting societal norms. Love’s journey begins amidst the heartache of tragic personal loss — the death of Katie’s mother — and the appeal of a utopian promise within the Jehovah’s Witness faith. The book intricately weaves together the landscape of a changing America with Love’s heroic personal journey in a landscape of a changing America, illuminating the challenges and triumphs she experienced as an innocent young girl undergoing profound personal, social and cultural changes. The memoir chronicles Love’s quest to see her mother again in “Paradise”, an earnest endeavor that leads her through unforeseen adversities and unveils a world starkly different from the one promised. Love’s narrative dances between tragedy and comedy with tender introspection, recounting the transformation of a Bible-wielding child evangelist into a vivacious comedian who discovers solace and healing through the cathartic medium of humor. “Katie Love’s remarkable memoir is as unexpected a read as her life’s journey has been. She has survived truly harrowing experiences thanks to her inner strength and undimmed resilience. But Katie’s fierce intelligence and wry sense of humor shine brightly throughout even the darkest moments, and will have you wiping tears of laughter from your eyes even as your heart breaks. Katie’s writing is raw, brave, and at times unexpectedly poignant. This is an unforgettable book.” praised Channing Dungey, Chairman of Warner Bros. Television, adding to the growing acclaim surrounding Love’s work. Love’s unfiltered storytelling refrains from sugar-coating the painful realities, yet remarkably, it remains devoid of bitterness. She candidly yearns for love and acceptance from a family trapped in their inability to provide the support she deserves. Through her memoir, Love reflects on the transformative nature of self-love amid adversity, offering readers a poignant glimpse into the human capacity for resilience and the pursuit of acceptance in the face of trials. The memoir’s raw portrayal of life’s complexities makes it a thought-provoking read. Available in print, digital, and audio formats, the memoir promises an immersive reading experience that resonates with readers seeking poignant storytelling intertwined with the power of humor. The book is available for purchase on Amazon and Kindle. Visit https://creweststudio.com/twoticketstoparadise/ to learn more.
